title: How to Make "Cookies of All Traits"

steps.headline: Lay out the dough.
steps.description: Then cut it into different shapes of Traits. The List of Shapes will be listed in the Tips section.

steps.headline: Add on Certain Cookie Toppings relevant to that shape.
If it's store-bought dough, bake according to the Package.
steps.description: If it's handmade dough, bake at approximately 340 degrees for about 12 to 15 minutes.

steps.headline: When done, let it cool for 20 seconds.
Add on the Icing/Frosting.
steps.description: Let it sit for about 10 seconds.

text: Lay out the dough. Then cut it into different shapes of Traits. The List of Shapes will be listed in the Tips section. Add on Certain Cookie Toppings relevant to that shape.  If it's store-bought dough, bake according to the Package. If it's handmade dough, bake at approximately 340 degrees for about 12 to 15 minutes. When done, let it cool for 20 seconds.  Add on the Icing/Frosting. Let it sit for about 10 seconds. Save it or Enjoy!
